**Example 1: 示例1**



Input: 

```
tccli keewidb DescribeProductInfo --cli-unfold-argument ```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RegionSet": [
            {
                "Area": "华南地区",
                "RegionId": "ap-guangzhou",
                "RegionName": "广州",
                "RegionShortName": "GZ",
                "ZoneSet": [
                    {
                        "NetWorkType": [
                            "vpcnet"
                        ]
                    }
                ]
            }
        ],
        "RequestId": "66756b8c-3f59-4a2e-9ee2-04333000bbc5"
    }
}
```
